      public void StockAndMarkDelivered(SupplyOrder supplyOrder, Shelf shelf, LocalDateTime deliveredDate, boolean trackable, TrackableItem.TRACKABLE_ITEM_TYPE type) throws IllegalModificationException
      Mark a supply order as delivered and put the items in stock Note: serial numbers for trackable items are auto-generated
      Parameters:
      supplyOrder - the supply order
      shelf - the shelf to put the items in
      trackable - whether to add 'trackable' items or non
      Throws:
      IllegalModificationException - when already put into stock
